record.annotation: Pollex 06: Magau. :To turn in one direction, to make a curve to one direction.
Chew, masticate solids which make noise (Lbr)
Very thick rope, especially as used for hauling whales (Obs)
Make a small hole in something (Lbr)
Cast, throw, fish with casting net (Lbr)
Climb from one height to another, as from tree to tree (Ebt)
